widgets.name: Analog Clock
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A fully customizable analog clock. Two example clocks are included. Please see the ReadMe document for more details.

widgets.name: Background Grid
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A fully customizable full-screen grid.

widgets.author: Daniel Barca
widgets.description: Display total CPU usage with a progress bar. Design based on Network Throughput by Adam Courtemanche.

widgets.name: CurrLocation
widgets.author: Jim Kimmel
widgets.description: Displays the city and state for the current location based on the current public IP address, using freegeoip.net.

widgets.name: NetworkInfo
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: Displays current Ethernet and Wi-Fi status (connected / not connected / IP Address / Mac Address.

widgets.name: rdio-current-track

widgets.description: Displays current track played by Rdio

widgets.name: Storyline Productivity Schedule
widgets.author: Mike Wilson
widgets.description: Displays your daily SPS for the Day

widgets.description: Displays current sport scores in a ticker-style format

widgets.name: SpotifyCurrentTrack
widgets.author: ThomasBrace
widgets.description: Displays current track palying in spotify

widgets.name: Stock quotes widget
widgets.author: Erik Dasque
widgets.description: Displays stock quotes in a table format with color-coding of wins/loss

widgets.name: Today
widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A small collection of widgets that show daily information: Today's Date, Today in History (from History.com), Today's News (from Reuters) and Today's Word (from WordSmith.org).

widgets.author: Chris Johnson
widgets.description: A widget that shows multiple timezones in either horizontal or vertical orientation

widgets.description: Shows disk usage for mounted disks, with the option to exclude specific disks. Update: now with new style in two variants!
